name: StudyOS
desc: AI-powered study platform with automated note analysis and MCQ generation. Real-time collaborative study sessions. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and HuggingFace — 40% faster page loads, 25% higher learner engagement.

name: DevPath
desc: Interactive roadmap-based learning platform for developers. Categorized resource library and structured learning paths — 30% user retention and 25% better content discoverability.

name: Email Ticketing Platform
desc: Full-featured email-based customer support ticketing system. REST APIs and DB schemas for high-volume workflows — 40% faster response turnaround, 50% improved system reliability.

name: SocialGram-me
desc: Social media image-sharing app with React, Tailwind, React Query, and Appwrite backend.

name: Pictures-me
desc: Full-stack social media app for sharing pictures. React and Sanity.io backend.

name: Query-me
desc: Wikipedia search app built with React.js. Real-time results and simple, efficient UX.

name: Prompting
desc: Open-source AI prompt tool to discover, create, and share creative prompts.

name: Sumzer
desc: Open-source article summarizer that turns long articles into clear, concise summaries.

name: Sorry Bubu
desc: A playful “say sorry” micro-app — Dudu messed up. Will you forgive him?

name: WebDevTools
desc: Collaborator on webdevtools — open-source toolkit for web developers. Contributed features and UX improvements.

name: Appwrite Website
desc: Contributed to Appwrite (45.2k★): UI fixes, bug triaging, and documentation improvements.

name: RepoRater
desc: Contributed to RepoRater: bug fixes, UI improvements, and features for better UX.
